# Grunt

# Gulp

npm install gulp 
vim gulpfile.js

exports.foo = done => {
    console.log('foo task working~')
    done()
}

exports.default = done => {
    console.log('default task working~')
    done()
}

const gulp = require('gulp')

gulp.task('bar', done => {
    console.log('bar working')
    done()
})
